pkgmetadata.longdescription: Brightway2 data management==========================.. image:: https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/uqixaochulbu6vjv?svg=true :target: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/cmutel/brightway2-data :alt: bw2data appveyor build status.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/bitbucket/cmutel/brightway2-data/badge.svg?branch=master :target: https://coveralls.io/bitbucket/cmutel/brightway2-data?branch=default :alt: Test coverage reportThis package provides tools for the management of inventory databases and impact assessment methods. It is part of the `Brightway2 LCA framework <https://brightwaylca.org>`_. `Online documentation <https://docs.brightwaylca.org/>`_ is available, and the source code is hosted on `Bitbucket <https://bitbucket.org/cmutel/brightway2-data>`_.
